info.description:
=====================================
ip Communication Library for Topology
=====================================

Linux ip command Communication Library for Topology


Documentation
=============

    https://github.com/HPENetworking/topology_lib_ip/tree/master/doc


Changelog
=========

0.2.0
-----

**Changes**

- Updated developer guide to reflect Python 3 development and to not use pip
  from system repositories (as it is too old).

**New**

- Added function ``remove_link_type_vlan`` that allows to remove vlan
  virtual links created with ``add_link_type_vlan``.

**Fixes**

- Fixed issue in ``add_link_type_vlan`` that ignored the ports mapping of the
  node.
- Fixed issue in ``add_link_type_vlan`` that registered the port mapping before
  creating it, causing potential issue if the creation failed.


0.1.0
-----

**New**

- Initial release.

info.html_description:
Linux ip command Communication Library for Topology

Documentation

https://github.com/HPENetworking/topology_lib_ip/tree/master/doc

Changelog

0.2.0

Changes

  • Updated developer guide to reflect Python 3 development and to not use pip from system repositories (as it is too old).

New

  • Added function remove_link_type_vlan that allows to remove vlan virtual links created with add_link_type_vlan.

Fixes

  • Fixed issue in add_link_type_vlan that ignored the ports mapping of the node.
  • Fixed issue in add_link_type_vlan that registered the port mapping before creating it, causing potential issue if the creation failed.

0.1.0

New

  • Initial release.
